name: Road Work
description:
Time to get to work!

It is your first day on your new road construction job, and you've been tasked with bringing the correct materials to the right people. Be careful of getting stuck in corners though or you'll be fired!

Road Work was made as a prototype for my game design class.

Created by: Christian Roby

Music from Youtube's royalty free library

Sound effects from Freesounds.org
